alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 9:07PM EST until December 06 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 MPH. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Grayson County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds could gust up to 45 MPH along the higher elevations Wednesday morning. Wind chill values will be in the teens and 20s Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
